verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> I was jealous <S%H7065><s%> for Zion <S%H6726><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> jealousy, <S%H7068><s%> and I was jealous <S%H7065><s%> for her with great <S%H1419><s%> fury. <S%H2534><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> I am returned <S%H7725><s%> to Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of truth; <S%H571><s%> and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> There shall yet <S%H5750><s%> old <S%H2205><s%> men and old <S%H2205><s%> women dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the streets <S%H7339><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> with his staff <S%H4938><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> for very <S%H7230><s%> age. <S%H3117><s%>
And the streets <S%H7339><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of boys <S%H3206><s%> and girls <S%H3207><s%> playing <S%H7832><s%> in the streets <S%H7339><s%> thereof.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> If <S%H3588><s%> it be marvelous <S%H6381><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> in these <S%H1992><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> should it also <S%H1571><s%> be marvelous <S%H6381><s%> in my eyes? <S%H5869><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will save <S%H3467><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> from the east <S%H4217><s%> country, <S%H776><s%> and from the west <S%H3996><s%> <S%H8121><s%> country; <S%H776><s%>

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> them, and they shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> and they shall be my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will be their God, <S%H430><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> and in righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> Let your hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong, <S%H2388><s%> you that hear <S%H8085><s%> in these <S%H428><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in the day <S%H3117><s%> that the foundation <S%H3248><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> was laid, <S%H7760><s%> that the temple <S%H1964><s%> might be built. <S%H1129><s%>

For before <S%H6440><s%> these <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> there was no <S%H3808><s%> hire <S%H7939><s%> for man, <S%H120><s%> nor <S%H369><s%> any hire <S%H7939><s%> for beast; <S%H929><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> was there any peace <S%H7965><s%> to him that went <S%H3318><s%> out or came <S%H935><s%> in because <S%H4480><s%> of the affliction: <S%H6862><s%> for I set <S%H7971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H120><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> against his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

But now <S%H6258><s%> I will not be to the residue <S%H7611><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> as in the former <S%H7223><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

For the seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be prosperous; <S%H7965><s%> the vine <S%H1612><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> her fruit, <S%H6529><s%> and the ground <S%H776><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> her increase, <S%H2981><s%> and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> their dew; <S%H2919><s%> and I will cause the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to possess <S%H5157><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things.

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that as you were a curse <S%H7045><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will I save <S%H3467><s%> you, and you shall be a blessing: <S%H1293><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not, but let your hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong. <S%H2388><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> As I thought <S%H2161><s%> to punish <S%H7489><s%> you, when your fathers <S%H1><s%> provoked me to wrath, <S%H7107><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> and I repented <S%H5162><s%> not:

So <S%H3651><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> have I thought <S%H2161><s%> in these <S%H428><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> to do well <S%H3190><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> you not.

These <S%H428><s%> are the things that you shall do; <S%H6213><s%> Speak <S%H1696><s%> you every man <S%H376><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> to his neighbor; <S%H7453><s%> execute <S%H8199><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> in your gates: <S%H8179><s%>

And let none <S%H408><s%> of you imagine evil <S%H7451><s%> in your hearts <S%H3820><s%> against his neighbor; <S%H7453><s%> and love <S%H157><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> oath: <S%H7621><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are things that I hate, <S%H8130><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> The fast <S%H6685><s%> of the fourth <S%H7243><s%> month, and the fast <S%H6685><s%> of the fifth, <S%H2549><s%> and the fast <S%H6685><s%> of the seventh, <S%H7637><s%> and the fast <S%H6685><s%> of the tenth, <S%H6224><s%> shall be to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> and gladness, <S%H8057><s%> and cheerful <S%H2896><s%> feasts; <S%H4150><s%> therefore love <S%H157><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> and peace. <S%H7965><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> It shall yet <S%H5750><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to pass, that there shall come people, <S%H5971><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%>

And the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> city shall go <S%H1980><s%> to another, <S%H259><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let us go <S%H3212><s%> speedily <S%H1980><s%> to pray <S%H2470><s%> before <S%H854><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and to seek <S%H1245><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%> I will go <S%H3212><s%> also. <S%H1571><s%>

Yes, many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> and strong <S%H6099><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and to pray <S%H2470><s%> before <S%H854><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> In those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> it shall come to pass, that ten <S%H6235><s%> men <S%H582><s%> shall take <S%H2388><s%> hold <S%H2388><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> languages <S%H3956><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> even shall take <S%H2388><s%> hold <S%H2388><s%> of the skirt <S%H3671><s%> of him that is a Jew, <S%H3064><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> We will go <S%H3212><s%> with you: for we have heard <S%H8085><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> is with you.
